title: HAP 94 - How Did You Happen? - Richard Wright
itunes:title: HAP 94 - How Did You Happen? - Richard Wright
description: Famous for his incendiary novel Native Son, Richard Wright responds in his multifaceted writings to sociology, communism, colonialism, and existentialism.
